d31a41c35927f02f2fb40d19380b5df4bb2b6d57.actualSource:
public String toString() {
      return String.format("%s.%s [%s,"
              + " threshold = %s,"
              + " max idle iteration = %s,"
              + " #excluded nodes = %s,"
              + " #included nodes = %s,"
              + " #source nodes = %s,"
              + " #blockpools = %s,"
              + " run during upgrade = %s]",
          Balancer.class.getSimpleName(), getClass().getSimpleName(), policy,
          threshold, maxIdleIteration, excludedNodes.size(),
          includedNodes.size(), sourceNodes.size(), blockpools.size(),
          runDuringUpgrade);
    }

7ecbfd44aa57f5f54c214b7fdedda2500be76f51.commitMessage: HDFS-8826. In Balancer, add an option to specify the source node list so that balancer only selects blocks to move from those nodes.

+              + " max idle iteration = %s,"
+              + " #excluded nodes = %s,"
+              + " #included nodes = %s,"
+              + " #source nodes = %s,"

           Balancer.class.getSimpleName(), getClass().getSimpleName(),
           policy, threshold, maxIdleIteration,

           runDuringUpgrade);

7ecbfd44aa57f5f54c214b7fdedda2500be76f51.actualSource:
public String toString() {
      return String.format("%s.%s [%s,"
              + " threshold = %s,"
              + " max idle iteration = %s,"
              + " #excluded nodes = %s,"
              + " #included nodes = %s,"
              + " #source nodes = %s,"
              + " run during upgrade = %s]",
          Balancer.class.getSimpleName(), getClass().getSimpleName(),
          policy, threshold, maxIdleIteration,
          excludedNodes.size(), includedNodes.size(), sourceNodes.size(),
          runDuringUpgrade);
    }

a7a7768341f1b7d3a8f2686e2f4d00c57f2e1d4f.actualSource:
public String toString() {
      return String.format("%s.%s [%s,"
              + " threshold = %s,"
              + " max idle iteration = %s, "
              + "number of nodes to be excluded = %s,"
              + " number of nodes to be included = %s,"
              + " run during upgrade = %s]",
          Balancer.class.getSimpleName(), getClass().getSimpleName(),
          policy, threshold, maxIdleIteration,
          nodesToBeExcluded.size(), nodesToBeIncluded.size(),
          runDuringUpgrade);
    }
